name: Property Hunters: Final Frontier Edition
description: It's the year 2200, and the real estate market is booming! Customers are flooding to your door, and you need to find them their perfect new home... IN SPACE! Customers will arrive, mouse over them to see their budget and preferences, then drag and drop them onto one of your 3 spaceships. Mouse over planets to get information on them, and once you've found the perfect match, send that rocket to the new planet. The more the customer likes their new home, the more money you get! Now get out there, and start selling the newest real estate out there!
